Top-3 Scripts:
ul_419239: join --nocheck-order -j 1 A B | 
while read a b c d ; do 
    [[ ( b -le d && b -ge c ) || ( b -le c && b -ge d ) ]] && echo $a $b
done

Explanations about Options.-a:
FILENUM
 also print unpairable lines from file FILENUM, where FILENUM is 1 or 2,
 corresponding to FILE1 or FILE2
Explanations about Options.-e:
EMPTY
 replace missing input fields with EMPTY
Explanations about Options.--nocheck-order: do not check that the input is correctly sorted
